TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ExpandoToDispatchExMarshaler extends System.Object implements class System.Runtime.InteropServices.ICustomMarshaler

Docs.summary: Marshals the COM interface to either the .NET Framework interface, or to the interface, and vice versa.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Because the CLR does not use this custom marshaler automatically, it must be declared as follows:
``` void UseCustomMarshaler([MarshalAs(UnmanagedType.CustomMarshaler, MarshalTypeRef=typeof(ExpandoToDispatchExMarhsaler))] IExpando expando); ```

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void CleanUpManagedData(object pManagedObj) cil managed

Docs.param: The managed object to be destroyed.
Docs.summary: Performs necessary cleanup of the managed data when it is no longer needed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The CLR calls this method to clean up managed data allocated in the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CustomMarshalers.ExpandoToDispatchExMarshaler.MarshalManagedToNative%2A> method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void CleanUpNativeData(native int pNativeData) cil managed

Docs.param: A pointer to the unmanaged data to be destroyed.
Docs.summary: Performs necessary cleanup of the unmanaged data when it is no longer needed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The CLR calls this method to clean up the unmanaged data allocated in the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CustomMarshalers.ExpandoToDispatchExMarshaler.MarshalManagedToNative%2A> method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Runtime.InteropServices.ICustomMarshaler GetInstance(string pstrCookie) cil managed

Docs.param: String "cookie" parameter that can be used by the custom marshaler.
Docs.summary: Returns an instance of the custom marshaler.
Docs.returns: An instance of the custom marshaler.

remarks.format: ## Remarks All custom marshalers must implement this method, although it is not part of the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ICustomMarshaler> interface definition.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 GetNativeDataSize() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns the size in bytes of the unmanaged data to be marshaled.
Docs.returns: -1 to indicate the type this marshaler handles is not a value type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Because custom marshaling of value types is not supported in the .NET Framework, this method always returns -1.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance native int MarshalManagedToNative(object pManagedObj) cil managed

Docs.param: The managed object to be converted.
Docs.summary: Marshals an object from managed code to unmanaged code.
Docs.returns: A pointer to the unmanaged object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The CLR calls this method with the specified instance of a managed object to convert that object from managed code to unmanaged code, and it returns a pointer to the appropriate unmanaged object, representing the COM view of that object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object MarshalNativeToManaged(native int pNativeData) cil managed

Docs.param: A pointer to the unmanaged object to be converted.
Docs.summary: Marshals an object from unmanaged code to managed code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The CLR calls this method with the specified pointer to an unmanaged object to convert that object from unmanaged code to managed code, and returns a managed object representing the managed view of the unmanaged data.
